adef.name: MU6
adef.svalue: MU1 MU2 MU3 MU4 MU5 MU6

adef.name: GROUP1
adef.svalue: IU FPU1 FPU2 FPU3 BPU SRU LSU1 LSU2

adef.name: FLT
adef.svalue: FD*3 FPU1 FPU2 FPU3 FPU4 FPU5 FIN

adef.name: FLT4
adef.svalue: FD*3 FPU1 FPU2 FPU3 FPU4 FPU5 FIN

adef.name: FCMP
adef.svalue: FD*3 FPU1 FPU2 FPU3 FPU4 FPU5 FIN

adef.name: GROUP1
adef.svalue: BPU IU*2 IU1a IU1b IU1c IU2E0 IU2E1 IU2E2

adef.name: GROUP2
adef.svalue: LSU1 LSU2 LSU3 FPU1 FPU2 FPU3 FPU4 FPU5 FIN

adef.name: FLT4
adef.svalue: FP0^2 FP1^2 FP2^2 FP3^2 FP4^2 FP5^2

idef.name: RLWINM
idef.comment: Rotate left word immediate and with mask

idef.name: DIAB_SAVEM
idef.comment: Call prolog helper function to save registers

idef.name: DIAB_RESTM
idef.comment: Call prolog helper function to restore registers

popmap.rule: l=R&&r=R&&r.r=[0:31]&&r.r.r=[0:31]&&r.r.r.r=[0:31]: l(R) r(R) const(r.r) const(r.r.r) const(r.r.r.r): rlwinm $1,$2,$3,$4,$5
l=R && r=R && is_Ev64_reg(l) && is_Ev64_reg(r) : l(R) r(R) : evmergehilo $1,$2,$2
l=R && r=CONST : l(R) const(r): lis $1,$2>>16 ; ori $1,$1,$2&0xffff
base(r)=R && index(r)=R : l(R) base(r) index(r) : lhax $1,$2,$3
base(r)=R && index(r)=R : l(F) base(r) index(r) : lfsx $1,$2,$3
base(r)=R && index(r)=R : l(F) base(r) index(r) : lfdx $1,$2,$3

Xpopmap.rule: l=R && r=r0 && lis(r.r) : l(R) lis(r.r) : lis $1,$2

popmap.rule: l=R && r!=r0 && r=R && lis(r.r) : l(R) r(R) lis(r.r) : addis $1,$2,$3
l=R && l=r && lis(r.r) : l(R) r(R) lis(r.r) : addis $1,$2,$3
l=R && r=R && r.r=R : l(R) r(R) r.r(R) : add $1,$2,$3
l=R && r=R && r.r=R : l(R) r(R) r.r(R) : subf $1,$3,$2
l=R && r=R && r.r=0xffffffff : l(R) r(R) : mr $1,$2
l=R && r=R && r=r.r : l(R) r(R) : mr $1,$2
l=R && r=R && rlwinm(r.r) : l(R) r(R) rlwinm(r.r): rlwinm $1,$2,0,$3
l=R && r=R && r.r=R : l(R) r(R) r.r(R) : and $1,$2,$3
l=R && r=R && lis(r.r) : l(R) r(R) lis(r.r) : oris $1,$2,$3
l=R && r=l && lis(r.r) : l(R) r(R) lis(r.r) : oris $1,$2,$3
l=R && r=R && sci8(r.r) : l(R) r(R) const(r.r): ori $1,$2,$3
l=R && r=R && r=r.r : l(R) r(R) : mr $1,$2
l=R && r=R && lis(r.r) : l(R) r(R) lis(r.r) : xoris $1,$2,$3
l=R && r=R && sci8(r.r) : l(R) r(R) const(r.r): xori $1,$2,$3
l=R && r=R && r.r=R : l(R) r(R) r.r(R) : xor $1,$2,$3
l=R && r=R && sci8(r.r) : l(R) r(R) const(r.r): mulli $1,$2,$3
l=R && r=R && r=r.r : l(R) r(R) : mullw $1,$2,$2
l=R && r=R && r.r=R : l(R) r(R) r.r(R) : mullw $1,$2,$3
l=R && r=R && r.r=R: l(R) r(R) r.r(R): slw $1,$2,$3
l=R && sci8(r) && r!=0 && r.r=R: l(R) r.r(R) const(r): addic $1,$2,-1*$3
l=T && r=l && r.r=T: l(R) r.r(R): se_slw $1,$2
r.r.r=R && r.r.r.r=[-32767:32767]: const(r) const(r.r) r.r.r(R) const(r.r.r.r): cmpi $1,$2,$3,$4
r.r.r=R && r.r.r.r=[0:65535]: const(r) const(r.r) r.r.r(R) const(r.r.r.r): cmpli $1,$2,$3,$4
l=C&&r=R && r.r=R : l(C) r(R) r.r(R) : cmpl $1,0,$2,$3
l=C&&l=cr0 && r=T && r.r=T : r(R) r.r(R) : se_cmph $1,$2
l=C&&r=R && r.r=R : l(C) r(R) r.r(R) : e_cmph $1,$2,$3
l=C&&l=cr0 && r=R && r.r=[0:65535] : r(R) const(r.r) : e_cmphl16i $1,$2
l=C&&l=cr0 && r=T && r.r=T : r(R) r.r(R) : se_cmphl $1,$2
l=C&&r=R && r.r=R : l(C) r(R) r.r(R) : e_cmphl $1,$2,$3

macro.name: diab.spill.32
macro.rule: r=R && r.r=[-32768:32767]: any(r) const(r.r) framepointer(r): stw $1,$2($3)

macro.name: diab.spill.64
macro.rule: r=R && r.r=[0:248]: any(r) const(r.r) framepointer(r): evstdd $1,$2($3)

macro.name: diab.spill.32
macro.rule: r=F && r.r=[-32768:32767]: any(r) const(r.r) framepointer(r): stfs $1,$2($3)

macro.name: diab.spill.64
macro.rule: r=F && r.r=[-32768:32767]: any(r) const(r.r) framepointer(r): stfd $1,$2($3)

macro.name: diab.spill.32
macro.rule: r=R && r.r=CONST: any(r) const(r.r) framepointer(r) new(R): li $4,$2 ; stwx $1,$3,$4

macro.name: diab.spill.64
macro.rule: r=R && r.r=CONST: any(r) const(r.r) framepointer(r) new(R): li $4,$2 ; evstddx $1,$3,$4

macro.name: diab.spill.32
macro.rule: r=F && r.r=CONST: any(r) const(r.r) framepointer(r) new(R): li $4,$2 ; stfsx $1,$3,$4

macro.name: diab.spill.64
macro.rule: r=F && r.r=CONST: any(r) const(r.r) framepointer(r) new(R): li $4,$2 ; stfdx $1,$3,$4

macro.name: diab.spill.128
macro.rule: r=V && r.r=CONST: any(r) const(r.r) framepointer(r) new(R): li $4,$2 ; stvx $1,$3,$4

macro.name: diab.reload.32
macro.rule: l=R && r=[-32768:32767]: any(l) const(r) framepointer(l): lwz $1,$2($3)

macro.name: diab.reload.64
macro.rule: l=R && r=[0:248]: any(l) const(r) framepointer(l): evldd $1,$2($3)

macro.name: diab.reload.32
macro.rule: l=F && r=[-32768:32767]: any(l) const(r) framepointer(l): lfs $1,$2($3)

macro.name: diab.reload.64
macro.rule: l=F && r=[-32768:32767]: any(l) const(r) framepointer(l): lfd $1,$2($3)

macro.name: diab.reload.32
macro.rule: l=R && r=CONST: any(l) const(r) framepointer(l) new(R): li $4,$2 ; lwzx $1,$3,$4

macro.name: diab.reload.64
macro.rule: l=R && r=CONST: any(l) const(r) framepointer(l) new(R): li $4,$2 ; evlddx $1,$3,$4

macro.name: diab.reload.32
macro.rule: l=F && r=CONST: any(l) const(r) framepointer(l) new(R): li $4,$2 ; lfsx $1,$3,$4

macro.name: diab.reload.64
macro.rule: l=F && r=CONST: any(l) const(r) framepointer(l) new(R): li $4,$2 ; lfdx $1,$3,$4

macro.name: diab.reload.128
macro.rule: l=V && r=CONST: any(l) const(r) framepointer(l) new(R): li $4,$2 ; lvx $1,$3,$4

macro.name: .diab.frameallocate
macro.rule: r=CONST : const(r) : li r0,0 - $1 ; stwux r1,r1,r0

macro.name: diab.store.ra
macro.rule: : stinfo(0) stinfo(1): li r11,$2+4 ; stwx r0,r$1,r11
r=r30 && r.r=[0:240]: any(r) any(r.r) any(r.r.r): evstdd $1,$2($3) ; diab.savem.gpr8 r31,$2+8,$3
r=r31 && r.r=[0:248]: any(r) any(r.r) any(r.r.r): evstdd $1,$2($3)
r=r30 && r.r=[0:240]: any(r) any(r.r) any(r.r.r): evldd $1,$2($3) ; diab.restorem.gpr8 r31,$2+8,$3
r=r31 && r.r=[0:248]: any(r) any(r.r) any(r.r.r): evldd $1,$2($3)

macro.name: diab.savem.gpr8
macro.rule: (r=r30||r=r31) && r.r=CONST: any(r) any(r.r) any(r.r.r): addi r11,$3,$2 ; diab.savem.gpr8 $1,0,r11

macro.name: diab.restorem.gpr8
macro.rule: (r=r30||r=r31) && r.r=CONST: any(r) any(r.r) any(r.r.r): addi r11,$3,$2 ; diab.restorem.gpr8 $1,0,r11

macro.name: diab.savem.gpr8
macro.rule: : any(r) any(r.r) any(r.r.r) regno(r): diab.get.ra ; addi r11,$3,(((32-$4)*8)+$2)-144 ; diab.savem8 $1,r11 ; diab.store.ra

macro.name: diab.restorem.gpr8
macro.rule: : any(r) any(r.r) any(r.r.r) regno(r): diab.load.ra ; addi r11,$3,(((32-$4)*8)+$2)-144 ; diab.restm8 $1,r11 ; diab.set.ra

macro.cond:
<macro name="diab.savem.gpr4" rule="r<r31 && r.r=[-32768:32767]: any(r) any(r.r) any(r.r.r) nextreg(r): stw $1,$2($3) ; diab.savem.gpr4 $4,$2+4,$3" /> <macro name="diab.restorem.gpr4" rule="r<r31 && r.r=[-32768:32767]: any(r) any(r.r) any(r.r.r) nextreg(r): lwz $1,$2($3) ; diab.restorem.gpr4 $4,$2+4,$3" />
<macro rule="r<f31: any(r) any(r.r) any(r.r.r) nextreg(r): stfd $1,$2($3) ; diab.savem.fpr $4,$2+8,$3" />
<macro rule="r<f31: any(r) any(r.r) any(r.r.r) nextreg(r): lfd $1,$2($3) ; diab.restorem.fpr $4,$2+8,$3" />

macro.name: diab.savem.gpr4
macro.rule: : any(r) any(r.r) any(r.r.r): addi r12,$3,$2 ; stmw $1,0(r12)

macro.name: diab.restorem.gpr4
macro.rule: : any(r) any(r.r) any(r.r.r): addi r12,$3,$2 ; lmw $1,0(r12)

isa.macro: <macro name="lis" rule="l=R && r=CONST : l(R) any(r) : diab.li $1,$2<<16" />

macro.name: slwi
macro.rule: l=R && r=R && r.r=CONST : l(R) r(R) const(r.r) : rlwinm $1,$2,$3,0,31-$3

macro.name: slwi.
macro.rule: l=R && r=R && r.r=CONST : l(R) r(R) const(r.r) : rlwinm. $1,$2,$3,0,31-$3

macro.macro: <macro name="addis" rule="l=R && r=r0 && r.r=CONST : l(R) any(r.r) : diab.li $1,$2<<16" />

macro.name: andi.
macro.rule: l=R && r=R && sci8(r.r) : l(R) r(R) const(r.r) : e_andi. $1,$2,$3

macro.name: ori
macro.rule: l=R && r=R && sci8(r.r) : l(R) r(R) const(r.r) : e_ori $1,$2,$3

macro.name: ori.
macro.rule: l=R && r=R && sci8(r.r) : l(R) r(R) const(r.r) : e_ori. $1,$2,$3

macro.name: mulli
macro.rule: l=R && r=R && sci8(r.r) : l(R) r(R) const(r.r) : e_mulli $1,$2,$3

macro.name: la
macro.rule: l=R && noreloc(r) && offset(r)=const && base(r)=R: l(R) base(r) offset(r): addi $1,$2,$3

macro.name: subi
macro.rule: l=R && r=R && r.r=CONST: l(R) r(R) const(r.r) : addi $1,$2,-1*$3

macro.name: subis
macro.rule: l=R && r=R && r.r=CONST: l(R) r(R) const(r.r) : addis $1,$2,-1*$3

macro.name: subic
macro.rule: l=R && r=R && r.r=CONST: l(R) r(R) const(r.r) : addic $1,$2,-1*$3

macro.name: subic.
macro.rule: l=R && r=R && r.r=CONST: l(R) r(R) const(r.r) : addic. $1,$2,-1*$3

macro.name: rotlw
macro.rule: l=R && r=R && r.r=CONST: l(R) r(R) const(r.r) : rlwinm $1,$2,$3,0,31

macro.name: rotlw.
macro.rule: vle(0)=0 && l=R && r=R && r.r=CONST: l(R) r(R) const(r.r): rlwinm. $1,$2,$3,0,31

macro.name: extlwi
macro.rule: l=R && r=R && r.r=[0:31] && r.r.r=CONST: l(R) r(R) const(r.r) const(r.r.r): rlwinm $1,$2,$4,0,$3-1

macro.name: extlwi.
macro.rule: vle(0)=0 && l=R && r=R && r.r=[0:31] && r.r.r=CONST: l(R) r(R) const(r.r) const(r.r.r): rlwinm. $1,$2,$4,0,$3-1

macro.name: extrwi
macro.rule: l=R && r=R && r.r=[0:31] && r.r.r=CONST: l(R) r(R) const(r.r) const(r.r.r): rlwinm $1,$2,$3+$4,32-$3,31

macro.name: extrwi.
macro.rule: vle(0)=0 && l=R && r=R && r.r=[0:31] && r.r.r=CONST: l(R) r(R) const(r.r) const(r.r.r): rlwinm. $1,$2,$3+$4,32-$3,31

macro.name: sub
macro.rule: l=R && r=R && r.r=R: l(R) r(R) r.r(R) : subf $1,$3,$2

macro.name: sub.
macro.rule: l=R && r=R && r.r=R: l(R) r(R) r.r(R) : subf. $1,$3,$2

macro.name: subo
macro.rule: l=R && r=R && r.r=R: l(R) r(R) r.r(R) : subf $1,$3,$2

macro.name: subo.

macro.name: subc.

macro.rule: l=R && r=R && r.r=R: l(R) r(R) r.r(R) : subfco $1,$3,$2

macro.name: subco.
macro.rule: l=R && r=R && r.r=R: l(R) r(R) r.r(R) : subfco. $1,$3,$2

macro.rule: l=R && r=R && r.r=CONST: l(R) r(R) const(r.r): evsubifw $1,$3,$2

macro.name: evsubw
macro.rule: l=R && r=R && r.r=R: l(R) r(R) r.r(R): evsubfw $1,$3,$2

macro.rule: l=R && r=R && r.r=R: l(R) r(R) r.r(R): isel $1,$2,$3,2

macro.rule: l=R && r=R && r.r=R: l(R) r(R) r.r(R): isel $1,$2,$3,1

macro.name: isellt
macro.rule: l=R && r=R && r.r=R: l(R) r(R) r.r(R): isel $1,$2,$3,0

macro.name: e_la
macro.rule: l=R && noreloc(r) && offset(r)=const && base(r)=R: l(R) base(r) offset(r): e_add16i $1,$2,$3

macro.name: e_sub16i
macro.rule: l=R && r=R && r.r=CONST: l(R) r(R) const(r.r): e_add16i $1,$2,-1*$3

macro.name: e_subi
macro.rule: l=R && r=R && r.r=CONST: l(R) r(R) const(r.r): e_addi $1,$2,-1*$3

macro.name: e_subic
macro.rule: l=R && r=R && r.r=CONST: l(R) r(R) const(r.r): e_addic $1,$2,-1*$3

macro.name: e_subic.
macro.rule: l=R && r=R && r.r=CONST: l(R) r(R) const(r.r): e_addic. $1,$2,-1*$3

macro.name: e_cmpwi
macro.rule: crf(r) && r.r=R && r.r.r=CONST: crf(r) r.r(R) const(r.r.r): e_cmpi $1,$2,$3

macro.name: e_cmpwi
macro.rule: r=cr0 && r.r=R && r.r.r=CONST: r.r(R) const(r.r.r): e_cmpi $1,$2

macro.name: e_cmplwi
macro.rule: crf(r) && r.r=R && r.r.r=CONST: crf(r) r.r(R) const(r.r.r): e_cmpli $1,$2,$3

macro.name: e_cmplwi
macro.rule: r=cr0 && r.r=R && r.r.r=CONST: r.r(R) const(r.r.r): e_cmpli $1,$2

expand.rule: r=R && r.r=R : crf(l) r(R) r.r(R) : cmp $1,0,$2,$3
r=R && r.r=[0:65535] : crf(l) r(R) const(r.r) : cmpli $1,0,$2,$3
r=R && r.r=R : crf(l) r(R) r.r(R) : cmpl $1,0,$2,$3
l=R && r=CONST && r.r=CONST: l(R) const(r) const(r.r): diab.li $1,$2 ; evmergelo $1,$1,$1 ; diab.li $1,$3
l!=r1: l(R) r(R) const(r.r): addis $1,$2,$3@ha ; addi $1,$1,$3@l
l=r1: r(R) const(r.r): li r0,$2 ; add r1,$1,r0
l=cr0 && r=T && r.r=T : r(R) r.r(R) : se_cmph $1,$2
r=R && r.r=R : crf(l) r(R) r.r(R) : e_cmph $1,$2,$3
l=cr0 && r=R && r.r=[0:65535] : r(R) const(r.r) : e_cmphl16i $1,$2
l=cr0 && r=T && r.r=T : r(R) r.r(R) : se_cmphl $1,$2
r=R && r.r=R : crf(l) r(R) r.r(R) : e_cmphl $1,$2,$3
l=R && r=R && r.r=CONST: l(R) const(r.r): li $1,$2

macro.name: vsldoi
macro.rule: l=V && r=V && r.r=r && r.r.r=0 : l(V) r(V) : .diab.vmr $1,$2

peephole.peephole: <i0 ivalue="POP.RLWINM" rule="r.r.r<=r.r.r.r :: UNCHANGED" /> <i1 ivalue="POP.RLWINM" rule="r=i0.l && r.r=0 && r.r.r<=i0.r.r.r && r.r.r.r>=i0.r.r.r.r : l(R) r(R) : mr $1,$2" />

i1.rule: l=R && l=r && r=i0.l && isLow(r.r) && stripRel(i0.r)=stripRel(r.r) : l(R) stripRel(r.r) : diab.la.halo $1,$2

peephole.peephole: <i1 ivalue="POP.ADD" rule="l=R && l=r && r=i0.l && r.r=CONST : l(R) const(i0.r) const(r.r) : li $1, ($2 << 16) + $3" />
<i1 ivalue="POP.OR" rule="l=R && l=r && r=i0.l && r.r=CONST : l(R) const(i0.r) const(r.r) : li $1, ($2 << 16) | $3" />

i0.rule: l=R && r=R && r.r=0 && r.r.r=CONST && r.r.r.r=r.r.r : r(R) const(r.r.r) : .diab.btsti $1,$2

i2.rule: r=i0.l && r.r=i1.l && dead(r) && dead(r.r): any(r) any(r.r): e_cmph $1,$2
r=i1.l && r.r=i0.l && dead(r) && dead(r.r): any(r) any(r.r): e_cmph $1,$2
